description: Oscar and Mooland used to save people who lost their way in the mountains but they have since retired. One day when Oscar was hiking in the mountains with Anna, the cliff gave way and she began to slide down. Mooland came to her rescue but just as she was about to be rescued by Oscar, the cliff also gave way on him and they all fell off the cliff. They ended up being saved by Mewtwo who quickly disappeared. Oscar`s Stoutland brought Mewtwo a Revival Herb after searching the forest for it. None of Oscar`s Stoutland moves can be confirmed.
name: Mooland (Oscar)
